name: ArchAIPack
label: Arch AI Pack
description: Arch Bot is a modified version of original Petra Bot AI. This pack includes 9 Arch based AI bots (Admiral, Capitalist, Communist, Imperialist, Mason, Mercantilist, Patriot, Theocrat and Unitary) and 4 Petra based AI bots (Imperialist, Patriot, Single Base and Unitary)
